resources.string: Can\'t fetch data, tap to refresh.
No spam! Only to secure your account
No mobile number found, please recheck it and try again.
You already used your free try
Magic link will be sent\nto your email
You will receive\na verification code via SMS
ATTENTION: You have only 2 free attempts to pass the KYC process. Every other attempt after that will cost €3.8. Paid attempts will be available after the next update of the app.
To complete the KYC you will need to:
Fill in the form with your name and address
An official document (utility bill, bank statement, government statement or correspondence) that contains your full name and address, and that is no older then 3 months
Submit a photo of proof of address
Passport, Driver License, ID card or Residence Permit
Submit a photo of your ID document
The guidance will be provided during the process

You have successfully completed your KYC application. The review is pending and you can expect a decision shortly.\n\nUsually the decision is made the same day and in some cases can take up to 3 days.
You have used your free attempt to pass the KYC process.\n\nWe kindly ask you to wait until the next upgrade of the application to proceed with paid attempts.
By continuing you confirm that you have read understood and accept these policies
We want you to know exactly how SORA Card services work, who and why needs your details. Reviewing these policies will help you continue using the app with peace of mind.
The SORA community does not collect any personal data, to get the SORA Card and IBAN account you will need to complete a KYC process directly with the card issuer.
Residents from certain countries can not apply for SORA Card at this moment
The KYC was terminated or it failed otherwise.
Your application has failed. To read more about the reason of the failure, please read the following additional description.
Your KYC verification is successful and we are already preparing to send you the SORA card!
Follow the magic link that has been sent\nto %s
Enter SMS code that has been sent to\n%s
